name: Tower of Chaos
summary: Tower of Chaos: Special Edition is a 2-hub long mapset for HeXen: Beyond Heretic, taking place in Cronos many years after HeXen 2 Portal of Praevus. Our three heroes must once again combat the forces of the Abyss to reach and kill Korax once again. What awaits them is canyons, swamps and old fortresses.
